bibl.title: New Identifications in P. Oxy. 2180 (Sophocles, Oedipus Tyrannus).
bibl.note: Contribution inédite. - P. Oxy. XVIII, 2180 (= M.-P.3 1466; LDAB 3934). Tient compte aussi de P.S.I. XI, 1192 (= M.-P.3 1467; LDAB 3934). - Pp. 382-385: Unplaced fragments.

bibl.title: W.S. BARRETT, Greek Lyric, Tragedy, and Textual Criticism. Collected Papers. Assembled and Edited by M.L. WEST

bibl.seg: BARRETT W.S., New Identifications in P. Oxy. 2180 (Sophocles, Oedipus Tyrannus).
